titles.title: For Christ is the Head of the Church

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For Christ is the head of the church. The first to rise from the dead, That He might be ruler, supreme over all And reconcile us unto God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All praise to the head of the church. By Him we shall rise from the dead, That we might be rulers to reign over all, Bearing witness to the powâ€™r of God.{/lang-eng}
